headline: BIRTH CONTROL BILL FAILS IN CONNECTICUT
BIRTH CONTROL BILL BACKED BY DOCTORS; Medical Society Is Unanimous for Connecticut Measure Designed to Save Lives
snippet: WATERBURY, Conn., May 4 -- Eighty-three delegates to the 155th convention of the Connecticut Medical Society at New Haven last week unanimously approved the Alsop Birth Control bill, but a battle lies ahead in the State Legislature.

headline: Planned Parenthood; Birth Control Is Supported by Majority of Physicians

snippet: A survey among 15,000 physicians throughout the nation showed that an overwhelming majority of them favor birth control, it was reported last night at a dinner of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America at the Hotel Plaza. The dinner, one of 100...
